""" 
====================================================
K-Graph
====================================================
This module generates a Knowledge Graph model and makes it available for the 
dashboard to use.

"""

from backend.models.interfaces.model_search import ModelSearch

# =========================== AUXILIARY FUNCTIONS ==============================

[docs]def get_ElasticBERT_info():

    model_info = {
        'name': "Knowledge Graph",
        'class_name': 'K-Graph',
        'desc': "Knowledge Graph - Generation and Querying",
        'link': "TBD",
        'repo': "TBD"}

    return model_info

    def __init__(self):
        self._info = get_ElasticBERT_info()
